alert.note: Alert for Delta; Fannin (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 20 at 3:37PM CDT until April 20 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN DELTA...SOUTHWESTERN LAMAR AND SOUTHEASTERN FANNIN COUNTIES... At 336 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Honey Grove, or 16 miles west of Paris, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Paris, Honey Grove, Roxton, Dodd City, Lake Crook, Lake Gibbons, Sumner, Forest Hill, Ladonia, Pecan Gap, Windom, Toco, Atlas, Noble, Glory, Broadway Junction, Allens Point, Dial, Biardstown and Howland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
